title: Multi-Track Multimodal Learning on iMiGUE: Micro-Gesture and Emotion Recognition
summary: Micro-gesture recognition and behavior-based emotion prediction are both highly challenging tasks that require modeling subtle, fine-grained human behaviors, primarily leveraging video and skeletal pose data. In this work, we present two multimodal frameworks designed to tackle both problems on the iMiGUE dataset.
